name: Ice Reptyro

aura.name: ice-loving_beast
aura.description: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of mining ores while mounted.

description: Ice cold blood runs throughout its body. If heated rapidly, its blood evaporates, causing an immense vapor explosion.

skills.name: ice_missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: cryst_breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: frost_burst
skills.description: Ice Reptyro's exclusive skill. Raises its front legs and slams them into the ground causing frozen blasts under its enemies. It simultaneously pounds them with snow balls from above.

skills.name: blizzard_spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
